channel.title: How to make weapons only for owner?
channel.description:
Like i got a perfect ring, if i wear it.
Then only Owners can wear it with 3 player rights.
If one with 1 2 or 0 player rights wants to wear then it says: You can't wear this item, its only for owners.
Then he cant wear it.
Thank you,
-Moerin
